Text: Defying Convential Wisdom Advisory Board Offer I was intrigued by your interview in the issue of InternetWeek Onlineas we seem to share the desire to transform the system Despite Enro n s better business model robust software infrastructure is as critical to Enrons success as for any other Fortune company Should you agree with our mission to deliver that infastructure we would be most honored to have you join our Advisory Board includes stock option compensation SEADE Software is developing a new category of software we call an Application Deployment Engine ADE I stress that this is a new category of software The ADE shares some of the features of several existing categories but no existing product or combination of products has thepotential of having such a profound disruptive affect on the process of developing complex enterprisescale eBusiness software The ADE enables rapid deployment of featurerich secure scaleable openplatform bestofbreed eBusiness software in Internet Time In addition it provides for better and more cost effective life cycle management and integration of that software Note that the SEADE team has previously buil t the ADE three times as the framework for specific vertical applications While this is a new category of commercial software its not a particul arly new idea What we are doing has in fact always been the way the academic world has said complex software systems should be written The evolution from structured languages to object orientation has been a continual effor t to find a means to leverage the effort and resources used to deploy past applications for the deployment of the next application Most enterprise software shares between of its core foundation and features with all other software We call these common horizontal components the Common Horizontal Frameworkof a custom application The vertical components are the parts that make the software valuable enough to risk the resources to develop and deploy mission critical applications SEADE Softwares core competency is the delivery of the horizontal compo nents that make up the majority of all business applications We deliver this in a highly customizable componentbased platformindependent fully internationalized prefabricated software application we call an ADE The ADE enables fasttracked development of new integrated eBusiness applicatio ns and provides a common reference for legacy Enterprise application integrati on manytomany EAI We empower the Fortune to maximize their core competency by leveraging ours Ive attached for your review our Executive Summary Business Case Slide show pitch and Advisory Board bios Please let me know if you find our offer o f interest Thank you for your consideration Best regards Scott Scott Peterson SEADE Software Inc cell SEADE Executive Summary Rev pdf SEADE Advisory Board Rev pdf SEADE Executive Summary Rev pdf
